english: Maternal and infant care products are selling briskly online.
chinese: 母婴用品在网上十分热销。
trans: adj. 母亲的；母性的；母系的；

english: Are you tired of exaggerated Hollywood action movies that defy common sense?
chinese: 你是否厌倦了那些违背常识、过分夸张的好莱坞动作片？

english: Insiders attribute good marketing and high quality to the film's success in addition to many fans wanting to see Walker's last performance.
chinese: 除了粉丝对保罗遗作的期待，业内人士将电影的成功归功于良好的市场和高水准的制作。

english: Spray paint and tape is all you need to dress up a barstool.
chinese: 想装饰高脚蹬，喷漆和胶带就能做到。
trans: n. 胶带；磁带；带子；卷尺

english: Why didn't Cinderella's glass slippers revert back to their original form at midnight, like the rest of her outfit?
chinese: 灰姑娘的玻璃鞋为毛午夜时没有变回原形呢？其他装备不都变回去了吗？
trans: vi.恢复 (先前的状态、制度或行为)

english: You can use old nail polish to create colorful key charms.
chinese: 你可以用指甲油自己做多彩缤纷的钥匙扣哦
trans: n.(手链或项链上的) 挂坠

chinese: 猫猫都有长长的、毛茸茸的尾巴。

english: There is this really mean girl, who bullys me constantly.
chinese: 有个刻薄的姑娘，总是恐吓我。
trans: adj. 卑鄙的；刻薄的；低劣的

english: They needs to sell 100 cupcakes to meet their quota for the day.
chinese: 俩人一天要卖100个杯蛋糕才能达标。

english: Many distressed teenagers seek solace in alcohol or drugs after a fight with parents or friends.
chinese: 许多痛苦的青少年在与家人朋友争吵后，会从酒精和毒品中寻求慰藉。
trans: n. 安慰；慰藉；安慰之物

english: Although it can be unnerving to see, sleepwalking is actually very common in kids.
chinese: 尽管有点吓人，但很多孩子都会出现梦游的情况。

english: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
chinese: 从来都是别离时，才知爱有多深。

english: Some talents are with us since the day we were born, others become obvious only after many years of mastery.
chinese: 有的才能是生来就有的，有的则是需要多年的训练之后精通了才表现出来。

english: A sailing boat is propelled by wind.
On the vast fields, one sees nothing but the wheat billowing in the wind.
chinese: 在辽阔的原野上，但见麦浪随风起伏。

english: During the evening walk, I'm able to think about my victories and clear away any residual negativity.
chinese: 在晚上的散步中，我能够想想我的战果，清除那些剩余的消极性。

english: I went out for dinner last night and drank copious amounts of red wine.
chinese: 昨晚我出去吃饭，喝了许多红酒。

english: We must confront future with optimism.
chinese: 我们必须乐观地面对未来。
